website_summaries.verdict: A good choice if you are looking for a metal vase with mid-range height for artificial bouquets. You can use it with fresh flowers, provided you purchase a water-tight liner to go with it.
pros: This attractive vase is made by hand, and garners enthusiasm for the durable iron workmanship
Exterior has an attractive hammered design
cons: Requires a liner if you want to put water in it
otherwise it works well for artificial flowers
Finish looks somewhat dull in person compared to online images

customer_reviews.title: Pretty silver vase (not using to hold water)
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty hammered silver vase at a great price (14.99 when I bought it). I am not using it for water, as it's for purely decorative purposes only. The silver coordinates well with the blue toile and ivory in my living area.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Dee

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! But much higher than the advertised 10 inches. It's huge! Very tall.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! But much higher than the advertised 10 inches. I measured. Its 14 inches tall. Other than that, stunning. I am keeping for another use.
customer_reviews.author: Review_this_right_now

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Buy !
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this. It added a touch of elegance to my bathroom!! Def worth it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like them very much.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the vase and the candle holder they look very nice on my black coffee table. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: 5 snaps of my fingers1
customer_reviews.text: FABULOUS! This vase looks good with most any decor. It looks very heavy, but is very lightweight. The size is substantial which makes it stand out and draw attention. I love it and I give it a full 5 kitties! 😺😺😺😺😺
customer_reviews.author: G.S. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful vase, good size
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful vase, good size, and nice quality. I used it in my entryway with tall flowers in it and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Hansen

customer_reviews.title: This was a very pretty vase, unfortunately I had to return it because ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a very pretty vase, unfortunately I had to return it because the opening was not big enough to put what I wanted to put into it. When the dimensions said it was 7" wide, it must have been referring to the widest part of the vase and not the opening.
customer_reviews.author: Hondi

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I like the way this vase looks! A nice touch! I will order 2 more. Very expensive look!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish vase
customer_reviews.text: I love this vase. It looks just like the picture. I use artificial flowers in it and it works with a variety of styles.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Trujillo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Product is as pretty in person as it is in the picture. Great vase!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very nice piece, sits on the dining room table with fresh flowers always
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and works just as we needed. The quality is very good No complaints from me on this product
customer_reviews.author: Richard Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! It looks fantastic and it has lasted through our house being covered in plastic through a mini remodel. It came in great condition, we ended up buying the whole matching set! Thank you! Well done!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle AB

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: I love this piece, I have no complaints it’s beautiful in my dining room. Looking for something else to go along with it that I can maybe put candles in and remove the eyesore candles that I have there. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Nikia M Baber

customer_reviews.title: Where's The Shine?
customer_reviews.text: When I saw this item I immediately knew it was something I HAD to have. I've been wanting to add more silver pieces to my decor and... This would've been PERFECT. I just received it today 4.3.17, and was VERY disappointed since I was expecting what was shown in the advertised picture. This item is VERY DULL and... I can tell it's composed of two "separate" pieces, as I can see the joint line. ADVERTISING is "VERY DECEIVING". I hate when that happens. I'm using a combination of dull and shiny pieces, BUT... This was going to be that main piece that "pops". NOT!! My search continues...
customer_reviews.author: iAmKreativelyMe

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: So cute. It went well with the flowers I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Sydni M.

customer_reviews.title: I was very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It wasn’t as big as I thought it would be, even though they said it was a floor vase it’s to small to be called a floor vase
customer_reviews.author: Monami

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: The reviews were accurate. Do not add water to this vase. ...its a beautiful piece...for decoration purposes only.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Such a great price and I get so many compliments on it!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Lovely but needs liner for fresh flowers

customer_reviews.text: Beautiful vases. Look great anywhere. Highly recommend. Super happy with purchase. I liked so much, I ordered 2 more

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pieces

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: they were pretty good which I thought maybe I over looked something ...
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews that posted before I posted.. they were pretty good which I thought maybe I over looked something about the vase.. because when I received my vase I was some what disappointed because I was looking for a beautiful shinning silver vase.. and that is not what I got.. Yes I got a silver vase but it was not shinning nor was it beautiful.. I didn't send it back because I found another use for it other than what I purchased it for.. Sorry I can't give this a better review I just think the picture of the vase is misleading..
customer_reviews.author: PBragg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Me
customer_reviews.text: Have this sitting on my mantle next to a mirror framed in a hammered metal.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Ross

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, practical and a great price...nice product
customer_reviews.text: I needed something for some small lit branches and this vase did the trick. I should say that I added some floral foam to the vase since my branches were small and slid down in the vase itself. Some floral foam did the trick. However, I would say that if you have a larger bouquet, you most likely would not need it. I was not looking to spend a lot of money, yet wanted something that looked nice and eye catching. I would recommend this vase. For the size and money spent, I believe that it is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to my living space. Looks even more expensive in person.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Don't
customer_reviews.text: Item scratched up and smelled like had dirt in it and was used. Never again. Terrible. Beware.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Hold Water!!
customer_reviews.text: Just so you know, this listing's statement of "For Decorative Use Only" means it can't hold water. So, if you're looking for an ACTUAL vase that HOLD REAL FLOWERS, look elsewhere. Ugh. I've attached a photo of the sticker at the bottom of the vase!
customer_reviews.author: Max Siegel

customer_reviews.title: Drop everything!  This is GORGEOUS!
customer_reviews.text: Squeeeeeeee! That's the sound I made when I unpacked this item! I'd been searching for the right vase for the silk calla lilies I'd bought and this is the perfect pairing. Perfect decorative touch I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Imjustnutz

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but light...
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty and very light. I thought it would be a lot smaller but it's pretty big to me. I think for the price it's a great buy. Also I have put water in it several times and have had no issues with leaks. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Bling Queen 👑

customer_reviews.title: Would not let me post my original review
customer_reviews.text: Sent wrong items. I received 3 smaller vases instead the one in this listing. I originally gave the product a 5 star review because the vases I received were the same type just smaller versions and just as pretty but it was rejected for what ever reason.

customer_reviews.title: beautiful!!!!

product_meta.title: Hosley 10 Inch High Hammered Iron Floor Vase Handcrafted by Artisans Using Centuries Old Hammer Pattern Techniques Ideal Wedding Gift Decor Aromatherapy or Spa Settings O4
product_meta.description: Hosley's 10 Inch High Hammered Iron Floor Vase. Handcrafted By Artisans Using Centuries Old Hammer Pattern Techniques. Ideal Wedding Gift, Decor, Aromatherapy or Spa Settings. Measures: 7" L x 7" W x 10" H. For decorative use only.
feature_bullets: PRODUCT: Hosley's 10 Inch High Hammered Iron Floor Vase.

USES: Designed to be used as a decor accent, they work great with artificial flowers. If using with fresh flowers, a water tight liner must be used. Hand crafted iron by artisans using century old techniques
BENEFITS: These are great for adding a decorative accent to your room's decor. They also make great gifts for a wedding, house warming and can be used for party, reiki, and spa.
MEASUREMENTS/MATERIAL: Each vase measures 7" L x 7" W x 10" H, silver in color and made of iron.

HOSLEY BRAND PRODUCTS: Hosley brand products are made from quality raw materials with minimal wastage at every step of production. With the goal of achieving a neutral carbon footprint, please recycle and help leave Mother Earth better off for future generations.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars209 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
